explanation: [0-0] The video features a split screen. The top and bottom sections are black. In the middle right stands a girl wearing a red and white polka dot skirt, a yellow base with a green vest, and a red tie. She has short blonde hair and smiles at the front. On the left, gray English subtitles appear "@fash". A partially visible green hand is on the far left, its palm facing forward. On the right, a partially visible red hand makes a gesture of a pistol. The background is a rolling shutter door. Below the shutter, a red shoe is exposed. Above the shutter, the gray English subtitles "@fash" appear again.

[0-4] First, the blonde girl in the middle right pulls down the straps of her green vest with both hands, then takes off her red tie and throws it to the right. In the middle left, the rolling shutter door rises, revealing another girl wearing the same red and white polka dot skirt and yellow base with a green vest. She is bending over with her back to the front, holding a mobile phone in her right hand. The phone in her hand flashes, then the red hand moves, and an orange-yellow circle appears in front of the palm. The circle then disappears, and the girl turns to face the front. She has short brown hair. The red hand on the right turns blue and opens with the palm facing forward. The green hand on the left reaches out to the brown-haired girl. The brown-haired girl raises her right hand holding the phone, revealing the thin and long black arm behind the green hand.

The brown-haired girl frowns, swings her right hand at the blue hand while holding the phone in her left hand. Then the blue hand reaches for the brown-haired girl's skirt, and the green hand reaches for her chest. The camera zooms in. Both the blue and green hands retract.
